quiz.text: Grouping of countries commited to remove all barriers to the free flow of goods and services between themselves and also pursue independent external trade policies is called
options: Free trade area
Custom union
Common market
Economic union
None of the above

quiz.text: Mercosur, a South American Trade block is a
options: Free Trade Area
Common Market
Custom Union
Economic Cooperation
None of the above

quiz.text:
The South Asian Free Trade Agreement (SAFTA) has not been a success because of 
  1. Narrow export base of countries 
  2. Lack of bilateral free trade agreements 
  3. Lack of Political will.
Select the correct answer using the codes given below
options: 1 and 2 only
1 and 3 only
2 and 3 only
1, 2 and 3
1 only

quiz.text: In December 1999, European commission members signed a treaty that committed them to adopting a common currency known as Euro. This is better known as :
options: Treaty of Rome
Treaty of Maastricht
Treaty of Lisbon
Treaty of London
Treaty of Paris

quiz.text: Which of the statements are correct regarding One Belt One Road initiative? 1. The Belt and Road refers to the land based Silk Road Economic Belt and the seagoing Maritime Silk Road. 2. China Pakistan Economic Corridor is a part of One Belt One Road initiative. Which of the above statements are correct ?

quiz.text: Which of the following statement is not correct about the SCO?
options: The first summit of the SCO was organised in China
Official languages of SCO are Chinese and Russian.
SCO represents 40% of world population
India and Pakistan became members in 2019
SCO headquarters  is  at Beijing.

quiz.text:
Which of the following statements about the Trans-Pacific Partnership (TPP) is/are correct? 
  1. The TPP was signed by 12 Pacific Rim nations in the year 2016. 
  2. The TPP is likely to be a game-changer in global trade as member countries account for about 40 percent of global GDP. 
  3. India is a founding member of TPP. 
Select the correct answer using the code given below.
options: 1, 2 and 3
1 and 2 only
2 and 3 only
1 only
2 Only

2014

quiz.text:
India is a member of which of the following? 
  1. Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation 
  2. Association of South-East Asian Nations 
  3. East Asia Summit 
Select the correct answer using the code given below.
options: 1 and 2 only
3 only
1, 2 and 3
India is a member of none of them
2 only

quiz.text:
Which one of the following statements regarding the Association of South East Asian Nations (ASEAN) are correct? 
  1. ASEAN was established in the year 1967 in Bangkok by five member countries. 
  2. Singapore is one of the founding members of ASEAN. 
  3. India is a sectoral dialogue partner of ASEAN. 
  4. ASEAN has ten members.
options: 1 and 4 only
2 and 3 only
3 and 4 only
1 and 3 only
All of the above

quiz.text:
At the East Asia Summit meeting that ended in early November in Bangkok in 2019, where the issue of concluding the much-hyped Regional Comprehensive Economic Partnership (RCEP) agreement was at center stage, India ultimately decided to opt out, saying its key concerns were not addressed. Making a forceful argument in his address at the summit, Indian Prime Minister Narendra Damodardas Modi said: “The present form of the RCEP Agreement does not fully reflect the basic spirit and the agreed guiding principles of RCEP.” Elaborating, he said: “It also does not address satisfactorily India’s outstanding issues and concerns. In such a situation, it is not possible for India to join [the] RCEP Agreement.” Q. Consider the following statement with reference to Regional Comprehensive Economic Partnership (RCEP)
  1.  RCEP agreement was signed without India joining.
  2. RCEP is a free trade agreement (FTA) between 10 members of The Association of Southeast Asian Nations (ASEAN) only.
Select the correct option-
options: Only 1
Only 2
Both 1 and 2
Neither 1 nor 2
Any of the above

quiz.text:

Making a forceful argument in his address at the summit, Indian Prime Minister Narendra Damodardas Modi said: “The present form of the RCEP Agreement does not fully reflect the basic spirit and the agreed guiding principles of RCEP.” Elaborating, he said: “It also does not address satisfactorily India’s outstanding issues and concerns. In such a situation, it is not possible for India to join [the] RCEP Agreement.”

Making a forceful argument in his address at the summit, Indian Prime Minister Narendra Damodardas Modi said: “The present form of the RCEP Agreement does not fully reflect the basic spirit and the agreed guiding principles of RCEP.” Elaborating, he said: “It also does not address satisfactorily India’s outstanding issues and concerns. Q. Which countries are divided by the nine dash line?
options: People's Republic of China (PRC) and Taiwan,
Afghanistan and Pakistan
Afghanistan and Iran
India and Myanmar
India and Srilanka

quiz.text:
At the East Asia Summit meeting that ended in early November in Bangkok in 2019, where the issue of concluding the much-hyped Regional Comprehensive Economic Partnership (RCEP) agreement was at center stage, India ultimately decided to opt-out, saying its key concerns were not addressed. Making a forceful argument in his address at the summit, Indian Prime Minister Narendra Damodardas Modi said: “The present form of the RCEP Agreement does not fully reflect the basic spirit and the agreed guiding principles of RCEP.” Elaborating, he said: “It also does not address satisfactorily India’s outstanding issues and concerns. In such a situation, it is not possible for India to join [the] RCEP Agreement.” Q. Which of the following statements is/are correct regarding the Regional Comprehensive Economic Partnership? 
  1. It is considered as one of the world's largest Free Trade Agreements (FTA), accounting for nearly 28% of the global GDP covering 30% of the world's population. 
  2. India has not joined RCEP over its concerns about Chinese goods flooding the Indian market and guidelines on rules of origin. 
  3. China, Japan, South Korea, Australia, New Zealand, The US, Canada, and the 10-country ASEAN group are members of RCEP.
options: 1 only
1 and 2 only
3 only
1, 2 and 3
2 only
